title: New Zealand Base Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in New Zealand increased to 10.93 percent in October from 10.60 percent in September of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in New Zealand averaged 10.33 percent from 1988 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 16.02 percent in July of 1988 and a record low of 7.50 percent in September of 1999. In New Zealand, the base lending rate is the average rate of interest charged on loans by commercial banks to new businesses. This page provides - New Zealand Base Lending Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Reserve Bank of New Zealand
